software engineering job for the role Graduate - Engineer Information Systems

• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.
• A global technology and professional services company that delivers consulting, technology and mission services to every major agency across the U.
• Government, defense and intelligence community.
• Our 30,000 experts extract the power of technology to create immediate value and deliver solutions at the edge of innovation.
• We operate across 30 countries worldwide, offering leading capabilities in digital modernization, AI/ML, Cloud, Cyber and application development.
• Together with our clients, we strive to create a safer, smarter world by harnessing the power of deep expertise and advanced technology.
• For more information about GDIT's Privacy Policy, click here: https://www.
• Com/privacy-policy/notices/.

• Staff Static Timing Analysis (STA) EngineerlocationsSanta Clara, CAposted onPosted 5 Days Ago2502125Senior Staff Design Verification EngineerlocationsSanta Clara, CAposted onPosted 5 Days Ago2502912Principal Design Verification EngineerlocationsSanta Clara, CAposted onPosted 5 Days Ago2502911Field Applications Engineer Intern - Bachelor's DegreelocationsSanta Clara, CAposted onPosted 6 Days Ago2502250Senior Staff Physical Design EngineerlocationsSanta Clara, CAposted onPosted 6 Days Ago2501299Senior Staff Engineer, Physical Designlocations2 Locationsposted onPosted 6 Days Ago2502633.

• Experience in creating, enhancing, and maintaining diagnostic tools for server stress testing.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams, external vendors, and users.
• Good technical writing and communication skills for creating documentation and training materials.
• Project management skills to plan, prioritize, and execute tasks effectively, especially when working on multiple projects.
• Support these tools with education and training.
• Experience in clocking, reset, power-up sequences and power management.
• Software development experience programming in C++ and assembly in a Linux based environment.
• AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program BS, or MS degree in Electrical, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, preferred Investor Relations Financial Information Board of Directors Governance Documents SEC Filings.

• The ideal candidate will have experience in Microchip firmware (MPLAB, Harmony), embedded Linux (ARM SoCs, Quartus), C++ GUI development with Qt, and networking (TCP/UDP).
• You'll translate customer needs into technical solutions and support project development end-to-end.
• Security clearance eligibility required (DoD preferred).
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
